summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the sale of certain fire-killed timber on City-owned lands in the Wenatchee National Forest; authorizing the contracting for services to assist in preparation and administration of the sale and the associated reforestation and post-fire rehabilitation; authorizing the application for and acceptance of grants from the Federal Government; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 Budget of the Water Department, and declaring an emergency therefor.
